mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_FREEBOARD_INFO (MI_ID, FBI_TITLE, FBI_CONTENT) VALUES (#{member.miId}, TRIM(#{fbi.fbiTitle}), TRIM(#{fbi.fbiContent}))
mapper.select: SELECT a.FBI_IDX AS fbiIdx , a.MI_ID AS miId , a.FBI_TITLE AS fbiTitle , a.FBI_CONTENT AS fbiContent , a.FBI_READCNT AS fbiReadcnt , a.FBI_ISVIEW AS fbiIsview , a.FBI_REGTIME AS fbiRegtime , a.FBI_UPDATETIME AS fbiUpdatetime , a.FBI_DELETETIME AS fbiDeletetime , b.MI_NICKNAME AS miNickname FROM T_FREEBOARD_INFO a, T_MEMBER_INFO b WHERE a.MI_ID = B.MI_ID AND a.FBI_IDX = #{_parameter}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_FREEBOARD_INFO SET FBI_READCNT = FBI_READCNT + 1 WHERE FBI_IDX = #{_parameter}
UPDATE T_FREEBOARD_INFO SET FBI_TITLE = TRIM(#{fbiTitle}), FBI_CONTENT = TRIM(#{fbiContent}), FBI_UPDATETIME = NOW() WHERE FBI_IDX = #{fbiIdx} AND MI_ID = #{miId}
UPDATE T_FREEBOARD_INFO SET FBI_ISVIEW = 'N', FBI_DELETETIME = NOW() WHERE FBI_IDX = #{fbiIdx} AND MI_ID = #{miId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_FREEBOARD_REPLY (FBI_IDX, FBR_IDX, MI_ID, FBR_COMMENT) VALUES (#{fbiIdx} , (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(FBR_IDX)+1 , 1) AS FBR_IDX FROM T_FREEBOARD_REPLY AS REPLY WHERE FBI_IDX=#{fbiIdx}) , #{miId} , TRIM(#{fbrComment}))
mapper.select:
SELECT A.FBI_IDX AS fbiIdx, A.FBR_NUM AS fbrNum, A.FBR_IDX AS fbrIdx, A.FBR_STEP AS fbrStep, A.FBR_LEVEL AS fbrLevel, A.FBR_PARENT AS fbrParent, A.MI_ID AS miId, A.FBR_COMMENT AS fbrComment, A.FBR_ISVIEW AS fbrIsview, A.FBR_ISSECRET AS fbrIssecret, A.FBR_REGTIME AS fbrRegtime, A.FBR_UPDATETIME AS fbrUpdatetime, A.FBR_DELETETIME AS fbrDeletetime, B.MI_NICKNAME AS miNickname, B.MI_TEAM AS miTeam FROM T_FREEBOARD_REPLY A INNER JOIN T_MEMBER_INFO B ON A.MI_ID = B.MI_ID AND A.FBI_IDX = #{no}
ORDER BY A.FBR_IDX ASC, A.FBR_STEP ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_FREEBOARD_REPLY (FBI_IDX, FBR_IDX, FBR_STEP, FBR_LEVEL, FBR_PARENT, MI_ID, FBR_COMMENT) VALUES ( #{fbiIdx} , #{fbrIdx} , IF(#{fbrParent}=0, (SELECT FBR_STEP FROM (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(B.FBR_STEP)+1,(#{fbrStep}+1)) AS FBR_STEP FROM T_FREEBOARD_REPLY B WHERE B.FBI_IDX=#{fbiIdx} AND B.FBR_IDX=#{fbrIdx} AND B.FBR_PARENT = #{fbrNum})AS C), (SELECT FBR_STEP FROM (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(B.FBR_STEP)+1,#{fbrStep}+1) AS FBR_STEP FROM T_FREEBOARD_REPLY B WHERE B.FBI_IDX=#{fbiIdx} AND B.FBR_IDX=#{fbrIdx} AND B.FBR_PARENT = #{fbrNum}) AS C )) , (#{fbrLevel} + 1) , #{fbrNum} , #{miId} , TRIM(#{fbrComment}))
mapper.update: UPDATE T_FREEBOARD_REPLY SET FBR_STEP = FBR_STEP + 1 WHERE FBI_IDX = #{fbiIdx} AND FBR_IDX = #{fbrIdx} AND FBR_STEP != 0 AND FBR_STEP >= IF(#{fbrParent}=0, (SELECT FBR_STEP FROM (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(B.FBR_STEP)+1,(#{fbrStep}+1)) AS FBR_STEP FROM T_FREEBOARD_REPLY B WHERE B.FBI_IDX=#{fbiIdx} AND B.FBR_IDX=#{fbrIdx} AND B.FBR_PARENT = #{fbrNum})AS C), (SELECT FBR_STEP FROM (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(B.FBR_STEP)+1,#{fbrStep}+1) AS FBR_STEP FROM T_FREEBOARD_REPLY B WHERE B.FBI_IDX=#{fbiIdx} AND B.FBR_IDX=#{fbrIdx} AND B.FBR_PARENT = #{fbrNum}) AS C ))
